A base file finder to be used for custom staticfiles finder classes.

DefaultStorageFinder

A static files finder that uses the default storage backend.

Module Contents

django.contrib.staticfiles.finders.searched_locations = [][source]
class django.contrib.staticfiles.finders.BaseFinder[source]

A base file finder to be used for custom staticfiles finder classes.

abstractmethod check(**kwargs)[source]
abstractmethod find(path, all=False)[source]

Given a relative file path, find an absolute file path.

If the all parameter is False (default) return only the first found file path; if True, return a list of all found files paths.

abstractmethod list(ignore_patterns)[source]

Given an optional list of paths to ignore, return a two item iterable consisting of the relative path and storage instance.

class django.contrib.staticfiles.finders.FileSystemFinder(app_names=None, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: BaseFinder

A static files finder that uses the STATICFILES_DIRS setting to locate files.

locations = [][source]

check(**kwargs)[source]
find(path, all=False)[source]

Look for files in the extra locations as defined in STATICFILES_DIRS.

find_location(root, path, prefix=None)[source]

Find a requested static file in a location and return the found absolute path (or None if no match).

list(ignore_patterns)[source]

List all files in all locations.

Bases: BaseStorageFinder

A static files finder that uses the default storage backend.

storage[source]
django.contrib.staticfiles.finders.find(path, all=False)[source]

Find a static file with the given path using all enabled finders.

If all is False (default), return the first matching absolute path (or None if no match). Otherwise return a list.

django.contrib.staticfiles.finders.get_finders()[source]
django.contrib.staticfiles.finders.get_finder(import_path)[source]

Import the staticfiles finder class described by import_path, where import_path is the full Python path to the class.
